short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove Kim Davis from Facebook Homepage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you're sick of seeing Kim Davis pop up in your Facebook feed (seriously, why give her any of your time and energy... or those who support her) this is for you. It won't catch everything as it's only looking for text matches with Kim Davis in them but for those that contain that they'll simply vanish from your Facebook feed.
